text: is there a database out there of Julia sysimages? Also, are sysimages composable? Can I have a sysimage for plots, one for DiffEquations etc and then load several of them? I'm guessing no, but would like to be sure

elements.text: is there a database out there of Julia sysimages? Also, are sysimages composable? Can I have a sysimage for plots, one for DiffEquations etc and then load several of them? I'm guessing no, but would like to be sure

text: You can only load one of them

elements.text: You can only load one of them

text: I wonder why only one. I know nothing about low level programming, but why can't we have a sysimage for a single package and compose them? In my understanding it compiled code. Is it a linker problem?

elements.text: I wonder why only one. I know nothing about low level programming, but why can't we have a sysimage for a single package and compose them? In my understanding it compiled code. Is it a linker problem?
